data_table.description: Unified Parkinson Rating Scale, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]

variable.name: UPR1
variable.description: Speech [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: Normal
Slight loss of expression, diction (clarity of articulation) and/or volume
Monotone, slurred but understandable; moderately impaired
Marked impairment, difficult to understand
Unintelligible
Untestable (specify reason):

variable.name: UPR1A
variable.description: Speech untestable reason [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]

variable.name: UPR2
variable.description: Facial expression [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: Normal
Slight reduction in facial expressiveness (hypomimia), could be normal "poker face"
Slight but definitely abnormal diminution of facial expression
Moderate hypomimia, lips parted some of the time
Masked or fixed facies with severe or complete loss of facial expression, lips parted 0.25 inch or more.
Untestable (specify reason):

variable.name: UPR2A
variable.description: Facial expression untestable reason [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]

variable.name: UPR3A
variable.description: Face, lips, chin [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: Absent
Slight and infrequently present
Mild in amplitude and persistent; or moderate in amplitude, but only intermittently present most of the time
Moderate in amplitude and present most of the time
Marked in amplitude and present most of the time
Untestable (specify reason):

variable.name: UPR3A1
variable.description: Face, lips, chin untestable reason [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]

variable.name: UPR3B
variable.description: Right hand [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: Absent
Slight and infrequently present
Mild in amplitude and persistent; or moderate in amplitude, but only intermittently present most of the time
Moderate in amplitude and present most of the time
Marked in amplitude and present most of the time
Untestable (specify reason):

variable.name: UPR3B1
variable.description: Right hand untestable reason [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]

variable.name: UPR3C
variable.description: Left hand [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: Absent
Slight and infrequently present
Mild in amplitude and persistent; or moderate in amplitude, but only intermittently present most of the time
Moderate in amplitude and present most of the time
Marked in amplitude and present most of the time
Untestable (specify reason):

variable.name: UPR3C1
variable.description: Left hand untestable reason [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]

variable.name: UPR3D
variable.description: Right foot [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: Absent
Slight and infrequently present
Mild in amplitude and persistent; or moderate in amplitude, but only intermittently present most of the time
Moderate in amplitude and present most of the time
Marked in amplitude and present most of the time
Untestable (specify reason):

variable.name: UPR3D1
variable.description: Right foot untestable reason [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]

variable.name: UPR3E
variable.description: Left foot [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: Absent
Slight and infrequently present
Mild in amplitude and persistent; or moderate in amplitude, but only intermittently present most of the time
Moderate in amplitude and present most of the time
Marked in amplitude and present most of the time
Untestable (specify reason):

variable.name: UPR3E1
variable.description: Left foot untestable reason [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]

variable.name: UPR4A
variable.description: Right hand postural tremor [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: Absent
Slight; present with action
Moderate in amplitude, present with action
Moderate in amplitude with posture holding as well as action
Marked in amplitude; interferes with feeding
Untestable (specify reason):

variable.name: UPR4A1
variable.description: Right hand postural tremor untestable reason [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]

variable.name: UPR4B
variable.description: Left hand postural tremor [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: Absent
Slight; present with action
Moderate in amplitude, present with action
Moderate in amplitude with posture holding as well as action
Marked in amplitude; interferes with feeding
Untestable (specify reason):

variable.name: UPR4B1
variable.description: Left hand postural tremor untestable reason [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]

variable.name: UPR5A
variable.description: Neck rigidity [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: Absent
Slight; or detectable only when activated by mirror or other movements
Mild to moderate
Marked, but full range of motion easily achieved
Severe; range of motion achieved with difficulty
Untestable (specify reason):

variable.name: UPR5A1
variable.description: Neck rigidity untestable reason [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]

variable.name: UPR5B
variable.description: Right upper extremity rigidity [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: Absent
Slight; or detectable only when activated by mirror or other movements
Mild to moderate
Marked, but full range of motion easily achieved
Severe; range of motion achieved with difficulty
Untestable (specify reason):

variable.name: UPR5B1
variable.description: Right upper extremity rigidity untestable reason [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]

variable.name: UPR5C
variable.description: Left upper extremity rigidity [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: Absent
Slight; or detectable only when activated by mirror or other movements
Mild to moderate
Marked, but full range of motion easily achieved
Severe; range of motion achieved with difficulty
Untestable (specify reason):

variable.name: UPR5C1
variable.description: Left upper extremity rigidity untestable reason [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]

variable.name: UPR5D
variable.description: Right lower extremity rigidity [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: Absent
Slight; or detectable only when activated by mirror or other movements
Mild to moderate
Marked, but full range of motion easily achieved
Severe; range of motion achieved with difficulty
Untestable (specify reason):

variable.name: UPR5D1
variable.description: Right lower extremity rigidity untestable reason [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]

variable.name: UPR5E
variable.description: Left lower extremity rigidity [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: Absent
Slight; or detectable only when activated by mirror or other movements
Mild to moderate
Marked, but full range of motion easily achieved
Severe; range of motion achieved with difficulty
Untestable (specify reason):

variable.name: UPR5E1
variable.description: Left lower extremity rigidity untestable reason [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]

variable.name: UPR6A
variable.description: Right hand finger tap [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: Absent
Mild slowing and/or reduction in amplitude
Moderately impaired; definite and early fatiguing; may have occasional arrests in movement
Severely impaired; frequent hesitation in initiating movements or arrests in ongoing movement
Can barely perform the task
Untestable (specify reason):

variable.name: UPR6B
variable.description: Left hand finger tap [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: Absent
Mild slowing and/or reduction in amplitude
Moderately impaired; definite and early fatiguing; may have occasional arrests in movement
Severely impaired; frequent hesitation in initiating movements or arrests in ongoing movement
Can barely perform the task
Untestable (specify reason):

variable.name: UPR6B1
variable.description: Left hand finger tap Untestable Reason [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]

variable.name: UPR7A
variable.description: Right hand movements [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: Normal
Mild slowing and/or reduction in amplitude
Moderately impaired; definite and early fatiguing; may have occasional arrests in movement
Severely impaired; frequent hesitation in initiating movements or arrests in ongoing movement
Can barely perform the task
Untestable (specify reason):

variable.name: UPR7B
variable.description: Left hand movements [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: Normal
Mild slowing and/or reduction in amplitude
Moderately impaired; definite and early fatiguing; may have occasional arrests in movement
Severely impaired; frequent hesitation in initiating movements or arrests in ongoing movement
Can barely perform the task
Untestable (specify reason):

variable.name: UPR7B1
variable.description: Left hand movements untestable reason [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]

variable.name: UPR8A
variable.description: Right hand alternating movements [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: Normal
Mild slowing and/or reduction in amplitude
Moderately impaired; definite and early fatiguing; may have occasional arrests in movement
Severely impaired; frequent hesitation in initiating movements or arrests in ongoing movement
Can barely perform the task
Untestable (specify reason):

variable.name: UPR8B
variable.description: Left hand alternating movements [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: Normal
Mild slowing and/or reduction in amplitude
Moderately impaired; definite and early fatiguing; may have occasional arrests in movement
Severely impaired; frequent hesitation in initiating movements or arrests in ongoing movement
Can barely perform the task
Untestable (specify reason):

variable.name: UPR8B1
variable.description: Left hand alternating movements untestable reason [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]

variable.name: UPR9A
variable.description: Right leg ability [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: Normal
Mild slowing and/or reduction in amplitude
Moderately impaired; definite and early fatiguing; may have occasional arrests in movement
Severely impaired; frequent hesitation in initiating movements or arrests in ongoing movement
Can barely perform the task
Untestable (specify reason):

variable.name: UPR9A1
variable.description: Right leg ability untestable reason [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]

variable.name: UPR9B
variable.description: Left leg ability [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: Normal
Mild slowing and/or reduction in amplitude
Moderately impaired; definite and early fatiguing; may have occasional arrests in movement
Severely impaired; frequent hesitation in initiating movements or arrests in ongoing movement
Can barely perform the task
Untestable (specify reason):

variable.name: UPR9B1
variable.description: Left leg ability untestable reason [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]

variable.name: UPR10
variable.description: Rising from chair [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: Normal
Slow; or may need more than one attempt
Pushes self up from arms of seat
Tends to fall back and may have to try more than one time, but can get up without help
Unable to arise without help
Untestable (specify reason):

variable.name: UPR10A
variable.description: Rising from chair untestable reason [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]

variable.name: UPR11
variable.description: Posture [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: Normal
Not quite erect, slightly stooped posture, could be normal for older person
Moderately stooped posture; definitely abnormal; can be leaning slightly to one side
Severely stooped posture with kyphosis (backward curvature of the spine); can be leaning moderately to one side
Marked flexion with extreme abnormality of posture
Untestable (specify reason):

variable.name: UPR11A
variable.description: Posture untestable reason [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]

variable.name: UPR12
variable.description: Gait [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: Normal
Walks slowly; may shuffle with short steps, but no festination or propulsion
Walks with difficulty, but requires little or no assistance; may have some festination, short steps or propulsion
Severe disturbance of gait; requiring assistance
Cannot walk at all, even with assistance
Untestable

variable.name: UPR12A
variable.description: Gait untestable reason [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]

variable.name: UPR13
variable.description: Posture stability [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: Normal
Retropulsion, but recovers unaided
Absence of postural response; would fall if not caught by examiner
Very unstable, tends to lose balance spontaneously
Unable to stand without assistance
Untestable (specify reason):

variable.name: UPR13A
variable.description: Posture stability untestable reason [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]

variable.name: UPR14
variable.description: Body bradykinesia and hypokinesia [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
variable.value: None
Minimal slowness, giving movement a deliberate character (could be normal for some persons); possible reduced amplitude
Mild degree of slowness and poverty of movement that is definitely abnormal. Alternatively, some reduced amplitude
Moderate slowness, poverty or small amplitude of movement
Marked slowness, poverty or small amplitude of movement
Untestable (specify reason):

variable.name: UPR14A
variable.description: Body bradykinesia and hypokinesia untestable reason [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]

variable.name: UPR0AY
variable.description: Year of completion date [Unified Parkinson Rating Scale]
